00090 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D: public BaseSRF_3D
00091 {
00092 public:
00096     static SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D* create(      SRM_ORM_Code orm,
00097                                                      SRM_RT_Code  rt,
00098                                                const SRM_LSR_3D_Parameters &params );
00099 
00103     static SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D* create(
00104                                                SRM_ORM_Code orm,
00105                                                SRM_RT_Code  rt,
00106                                                SRM_Axis_Direction forward_direction,
00107                                                SRM_Axis_Direction up_direction
00108                                                );
00109 
00113     static SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D* create( SRM_SRF_Parameters_Info srf_params )
00114     {
00115          return create(srf_params.value.srf_template.orm_code,
00116                        srf_params.rt_code,
00117                        srf_params.value.srf_template.parameters.lsr_3d_srf_parameters );
00118     }
00119 
00122     Coord3D* createCoordinate3D(SRM_Long_Float coord_comp1,
00123                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp2,
00124                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp3 );
00125 
00129     const SRM_LSR_3D_Parameters &getSRFParameters() const;
00130 
00134     SRM_Axis_Direction get_forward_direction() const;
00135 
00139     SRM_Axis_Direction get_up_direction() const;
00140 
00143     virtual bool isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const;
00144 
00147     virtual SRF_ClassType getClassType() const
00148     {
00149         return BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSR_3D;
00150     }
00151 
00155     bool isEqual( const SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &srf ) const;
00156 
00160     bool operator==( const SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &rhs ) const;
00161

00166

00172 protected:

00179 inline bool SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D::isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const
00180 {
00181     if (type == BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_LSR_3D)
00182         return true;
00183     else
00184         return BaseSRF_3D::isA(type);
00185 };

00196 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D: public Coord3D
00197 {
00198 public:
00201     Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D(SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D *srf,
00202                                     SRM_Long_Float u = 0.0,
00203                                     SRM_Long_Float v = 0.0,
00204                                     SRM_Long_Float w = 0.0 )
00205     : Coord3D(srf)
00206     {
00207         setComponentValues(u, v, w);
00208     }
00209 
00212     Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D( const Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &coord )
00213     : Coord3D(coord._srf)
00214     {
00215         setComponentValues( coord._values[0], coord._values[1], coord._values[2] );
00216     }
00217 
00223     void copyTo( Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &coord ) const
00224     {
00225         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00226             throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00227 
00228         coord._values[0] = _values[0];
00229         coord._values[1] = _values[1];
00230         coord._values[2] = _values[2];
00231     }
00232 
00236     bool isEqual( const Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &coord ) const
00237     {
00238         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00239                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00240                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] &&
00241                 _values[2] == coord._values[2] );
00242     }
00243 
00246     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float u, SRM_Long_Float v, SRM_Long_Float w )
00247     {
00248         _values[0] = u;
00249         _values[1] = v;
00250         _values[2] = w;
00251     }
00252 
00255     SRM_Long_Float get_u() const
00256     {
00257         return _values[0];
00258     }
00259 
00262     SRM_Long_Float get_v() const
00263     {
00264         return _values[1];
00265     }
00266 
00269     SRM_Long_Float get_w() const
00270     {
00271         return _values[2];
00272     }
00273 
00276     void set_u( SRM_Long_Float value )
00277     {
00278         _values[0] = value;
00279     }
00280 
00283     void set_v( SRM_Long_Float value )
00284     {
00285         _values[1] = value;
00286     }
00287 
00290     void set_w( SRM_Long_Float value )
00291     {
00292         _values[2] = value;
00293     }
00294 
00297     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00298 
00299 
00302     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00303     {
00304         return Coord::COORD_TYP_LSR_3D;
00305     }
00306 
00309     bool operator==( const Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &rhs ) const;
00310 
00316     bool isCompatibleWith( const Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &rhs ) const
00317     {
00318         return ((*(SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D*)(rhs._srf)));
00319     }
00320 
00325     Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &operator= ( const Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D &rhs )
00326     {
00327         if((*(SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_LocalSpaceRectangular3D*)(rhs._srf)))
00328         {
00329             _values[0] = rhs._values[0];
00330             _values[1] = rhs._values[1];
00331             _values[2] = rhs._values[2];
00332         }
00333         else
00334             throw Exception(SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_TARGET_COORDINATE,
00335                             "Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D op=: incompatible rhs coordinate");
00336 
00337         return *this;
00338     }
00339 };
00340 
00341 
00342 inline bool Coord3D_LocalSpaceRectangular3D::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00343 {
00344     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_LSR_3D)
00345         return true;
00346     else
00347         return Coord3D::isA(type);
00348 };
